query: SELECT externalId, COUNT(*) as count, message FROM chat_messages WHERE studentId = (SELECT id FROM students WHERE phone LIKE '%15997612063%' LIMIT 1) AND createdAt > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY externalId, message HAVING count > 1 LIMIT 10
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3TwTEpp3aQwpk4j.26ab54900c35 --database SFH8sqABSCK5KntMvXXcPM --execute SELECT externalId, COUNT(*) as count, message FROM chat_messages WHERE studentId = (SELECT id FROM students WHERE phone LIKE '%15997612063%' LIMIT 1) AND createdAt > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY externalId, message HAVING count > 1 LIMIT 10
